author: nataliaratnikova
body: New spacemon-client release  https://github.com/dmwm/DMWMMON/releases/tag/spacemon-client_1_0_3 with added dependency on p5-crypt-ssleay: a new package to provide Net::SSL perl libs used for authentication by both spacemon and PHEDEX, see https://github.com/dmwm/PHEDEX/issues/1065 .
title: P5 crypt ssleay and spacemon client 103
